document.full_text: tiger woods put himself into 'masters mode' sunday, ending weeks of introspective analysis to state confidently and simply that he can win the u.s. masters for a fifth time next month.
document.title: can tiger win the masters? absolutely, he says
lines_and_colors: tiger woods put himself into 'masters mode' sunday, ending weeks of introspective analysis to state confidently and simply that he can win the u.s. masters for a fifth time next month.
